message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $115. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $122.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $118. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $120, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $120, but I'm still a bit above $117. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $119, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $119, but I'm still a bit above $116. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
